Package ch.cern.dbod.util

This package contains the consumer for the SOAP Web Services implemented in the DB On Demand Syscontrol project.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticationHelper
    Helper to obtain information and manage user accounts.
    CommonConstants
    Class containing constants for DBOnDemand.
    DateTimeHelper
    Provides methods to manage dates and times
    EGroupHelper
    Helper to manage e-groups.
    ESHelper
    Monitoring helper to access metrics on ElasticSearch
    FileHelper
    Helper to manage snapshots using web services.
    FormValidations
    Implements static functions to validate fields.
    HTTPHelper
    Constains methods to manage HTTP operations.
    JobHelper
    Helper to create jobs.
    LocaleProvider
    Intercepts requests and configures Locale according to cookies
    ParamsHelper
    Helper to get params from instances.
    SnapshotHelper
    Helper to manage snapshots using web services.
    SSOHelper
    This class contains methods to deal with resources behind the CERN SSO

Package ch.cern.dbod.util Description

This package contains the consumer for the SOAP Web Services implemented in the DB On Demand Syscontrol project. The classes are generated from WSDL files using JAX-WS RI.
The children packages correspond to the clients for services consumed by DB On Demand
